name: Financial Institution
description: Institution significantly engaged in financial activities (banks, insurers, lenders)

name: Consumer
description: Individual who obtains a financial product/service for personal/family use

name: Customer
description: Consumer who has a continuing relationship with the financial institution (e.g., loan, account)

name: Affiliate
description: Entity that controls, is controlled by, or is under common control with the financial institution

name: Nonaffiliated Third Party
description: Any entity that is not an affiliate of the financial institution

name: Service Provider
description: Entity that maintains or processes customer information for the institution
